thumb.name: Valued and Appreciated
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERick %26#151;%3Cbr%3EThe way you care%3Cbr%3Eand the talents you share%3Cbr%3Emake you a valued%3Cbr%3Eand appreciated%3Cbr%3Eemployee...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and a truly nice person.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing You%3Cbr%3Ea Very Happy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Treat You to Lunch
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo My%3Cbr%3EWork Buddy.%3Cbr%3ELiz%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELet me treat you %3Cbr%3Eto lunch%3Cbr%3Efor your birthday!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESo. what'll it be - %3Cbr%3Ecandy bar.%3Cbr%3Echips. pretzels...%3Cbr%3Eanything%3Cbr%3Efrom the vending machine - %3Cbr%3Ejust name it!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday %3Cbr%3E
